text: Utu is a 1983 New Zealand drama movie directed by Geoff Murphy and starring Bruno Lawrence, Anzac Wallace, Tim Eliott, Ilona Rodgers, Wi Kuki Kaa, Martyn Sanderson, Kelly Johnson, John Bach. It was presented in the 1983 Cannes Film Festival. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Utu at New Zealand Film Commission Category:1983 drama movies Category:New Zealand drama movies Category:Movies directed by Geoff Murphy
title: Utu (movie)
